metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0217 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered that an internal Prosody library to load XML based on libexpat does not properly restrict the XML features allowed in parsed XML data. Given suitable attacker input, this results in expansion of recursive entity references from DTDs (CWE-776). In addition, depending on the libexpat version used, it may also allow injections using XML External Entity References (CWE-611).

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
